description: SYMBI-Vault document chunks with embeddings for RAG retrieval

properties.name: path
properties.description: File path of the source document

properties.name: chunk_index
properties.description: Index of this chunk within the document

properties.name: content
properties.description: The actual text content of this chunk

properties.name: doc_id
properties.description: Stable document ID (e.g., repo path hash)

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: Last modified time of the source doc

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: JSON string with any additional metadata
